item.title: SYDE 1B Term
item.description: The links below should point to the topics covered in each courses SYDE 223 Data Structures and Algorithms SYDE 112 SYDE 192 Digital Systems SYDE 162 Human Factors in Design SYDE 114 Matrices and Linear Systems.

item.title: Multivariable Chain Rule
item.description: The Chain Rule Recall the single variable version: If y=f(x) and x=g(t), then y=f(g(t)) and y'(t)=f'(g(t))g'(t) If we interpret y(x) as the temperature of air above Earth’s surface and g(t) as the position of a skydiver, then \frac{dy}{dt} represents the r.o.c of temperature felt by t...

item.title: Parametric Curves
item.description: Consider \vec{r}(t)=(x(t),y(t)) for a\leq t \leq b \vec{r}:\mathbb{R}\rightarrow \mathbb{R}^2 \vec{r} is a vector function If we input a value of t, \vec{r} outputs the vector (or ordered pair) (x,y), over a range of t values, we can connect the dots to obtain a curve in \mathbb{R}^2 .

item.title: SYDE 112
item.description: Topics Covered Week 1 Improper Integrals Integral Test Week 2 Solids of Revolution Week 3 Work Num & Numerical Integration Week 4 Multivariable Functions Partial Derivatives Tangent Plane Week 5 Gradient Vector Multivariable Chain Rule Parametric Curves.

item.title: Gradient Vector
item.description: Definition: f: \mathbb{R}^2\rightarrow \mathbb{R}, \triangledown f=(\frac{\partial f}{\partial x}, \frac{\partial f}{\partial y}) f: \mathbb{R}^3\rightarrow \mathbb{R}, \triangledown f=(\frac{\partial f}{\partial x}, \frac{\partial f}{\partial y}, \frac{\partial f}{\partial z}) We read \triangledown...

item.title: SYDE 112 Calculus 2
item.description: Topics Covered Week 1 Improper Integrals Integral Test Week 2 Solids of Revolution Week 3 Work Num & Numerical Integration Week 4 Multivariable Functions Partial Derivatives Tangent Plane.

item.title: EV Indifference
item.description: The word “indifference” means that two or more actions have the same value The Law of Selfish EV No hand should sacrifice value to improve the value of the rest of your range.

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Intro. In this folder I document all the information from GTO Wizard articles, as well as my studies in GTO Contents EV Indifference.
